bio:
Camel Cult 
Music NFTs Enthusiast
Life is Sharing <3
contributionDescription: As of now, I have contributed to bring many users into using Optimism ecosystem more by promoting the music platform Soundxyz on Twitter. After more than 2 years in crypto, most part is in downtrend, I realized the importance of learning and building the community from sratch to fully understand the ultility of the project and Optimism is a perfect place. I and  Camel cult have indugled in music NFTs a lot and I am now still spreading the music projects that Soundxyz has commited to change the whole music industry <3.

contributionLinks.description: My music collected in supporting Optimism and more will come for sure.
My Twitter post in promoting Soundxyz platform.
Camel Cult community in supporting project on Optimism

impactDescription: I would say that it is not largely impacted the world but I believe my small steps together with my Camel Cult community will change the world into a better place and bring more new users and fans to the ecosystem especially in music industry. By promoting ideas and new ways that can utilitize crypto, I can help to bring benefits to the future.

fundingSources.description: I do not receive any grants or anything as this is my first time apply
